name: Dripp - UI Kit Crypto Trading App
description:
Hey there, Check out this UI Kit I created of a concept Cypto app called Dripp.


Stay tuned as I'll keep adding more and more screens to this file.


About Me:

I am a curiosity-driven product designer propelled by the desire to craft delightful digital experiences for the next billion users. I am primarily focused user experience and visual design.


I am currently open to work and relocate around the world for a solid opportunity. I am looking to join a small tightly-knit team of stellar product designers.


Check out my dribbble profile here: https://dribbble.com/amentyagi


Reach out to me at amentyagi@gmail.com
